content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (17, 19), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"初期敵空母は(3,3)近傍。こちらは(17,19)。まずは敵推定位置へ向け安全距離を保ちつつ索敵を最速開始。空母は北西寄りの海域へ2マス前進して索敵圏を前出し。航空隊は扇形に広く(3,3)周辺へ向けて発艦し、往路で発見・即攻撃を狙う。帰還コースから敵位置を逆算予定。地形はほぼ海で障害少ない。次ターン以降、敵機動の兆候があればキャリアをサイドステップで回避する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":15,"y":17},"launch_target":{"x":5,"y":5}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (5, 5) while at (15, 17).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (16, 18), en route to target (15, 17), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (15, 17), outbound toward (5, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母は(3,3)近傍想定。BSQ1は(5,5)へ向け北西方面索敵攻撃中。空母は前進継続で発艦半径を前出しつつ、過度接近は避ける。BSQ2はBSQ1の扇形補完で(7,3)方面に出し、早期発見を狙う。敵未発見のため空母はさらにNWへ1ターン前進して索敵圏を拡げる。敵機の接近兆候なし。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":15,"y":17},"launch_target":{"x":7,"y":3}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (11, 12) while at (13, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (7, 3) while at (15, 16).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (11, 12) (previously at (10, 11)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (15, 17), en route to target (15, 17), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (13, 13), outbound toward (5, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (15, 16), outbound toward (7, 3), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵機ASQ1を(11,12)で確認。北西へ向かう軌跡(10,11→11,12)から、敵空母はその南東〜東側から発進した可能性が高い。初期想定(3,3)よりやや東寄り(5〜9,6〜10)に敵空母がいる公算。こちらは先に発見・先制を狙うためNWへの前進を継続しつつ、BSQ1/2は扇形で(5,5)と(7,3)へ進出中なのでこのまま往路接触を期待。空母はやや西北西へ前進して発艦半径を押し上げ、万一の敵機来襲に備え回避余地を確保。次報で敵機の帰還方向を読んでキャリアの迂回を実施予定。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":13,"y":15},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (13, 15) while at (14, 15).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (10, 10) while at (11, 10).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (13, 15) while at (11, 10).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (10, 10) while at (13, 12).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (13, 15) while at (13, 12).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (14, 9) while at (13, 12).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is engaging an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (11, 10).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (10, 10) (previously at (9, 9)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (13, 15) (previously at (10, 11)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (14, 9) (previously at (11, 9)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (14, 15), en route to target (13, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 10), engaging an enemy target at (10, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (13, 12), outbound toward (10, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母AC1を(10,10)で確実に捕捉、BSQ1が攻撃中、BSQ2も接近中。敵機ASQ1(13,15)とASQ2(14,9)は我空母付近に接近しており、往路でこちらを見つければ攻撃に移る可能性。空母は敵機の進路から外れる南西へ退避しつつ、攻撃結果で止めを刺す。追加発艦は不可(全機行動中)。先に撃沈を狙い、空母被弾を回避するため回避運動を優先。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":13,"y":17},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:

- your squadron(BSQ1) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (11, 10).
- your squadron(BSQ1) hit an enemy carrier(AC1) causing 19 damage while at (11, 10).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (11, 10).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (15, 9) while at (11, 10).

- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (13, 15) while at (11, 10).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (10, 10) while at (9, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is engaging an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (9, 11).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (10, 10) (previously at (9, 9)), HP 78/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (13, 15) (previously at (10, 11)), HP 19/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (15, 9) (previously at (11, 9)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (14, 15), en route to target (13, 17), HP 80/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 10), returning to the carrier, HP 21/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (9, 11), engaging an enemy target at (10, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"先手打撃に成功し敵空母は78/100。BSQ2が追撃中。ASQ1は19/40で我空母近傍(13,15)に接触、対空で20与え被弾しこちらもBC1は80/100。ASQ2は(15,9)で北東から南西へ進行中の可能性。空母は敵機の復路に被らないよう南西へ離脱しつつ、艦隊防空が継続できる位置に。BSQ1は帰投優先、着艦後すぐ再武装して波状攻撃。BSQ2の攻撃で撃沈を狙うためキャリアのさらなる安全距離を確保。敵空母は(10,10)付近で動きが小さく、次ターンも有効。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":12,"y":18},"launch_target":null}}

{"thinking":"敵空母AC1は依然(10,10)周辺でHP50と大きく削れている。こちらの両隊は帰投中で次ターン以降再攻撃可能。敵ASQ1は(11,11)で残19、ASQ2は北方(15,9)方面。空母は敵機の動線から外れつつ、次の発艦半径で(10,10)を十分に覆える位置へ退避前進のバランスを取る。南西へ1ヘクス下げつつ西へ1で(12,18)へ。これで発艦半径22内に敵空母域を収めつつ、敵来襲コースをずらす。次ターン、両隊を同時発艦して止めを刺す。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":12,"y":18},"launch_target":null}}

{"thinking":"敵空母AC1は(10,10)で静止傾向、HP50。こちらはBSQ1が着艦完了、BSQ2は帰投中。先に波状攻撃で畳みかけるべく、BSQ1を即発艦して最短でAC1を再攻撃。空母は発艦半径を維持しつつ、敵機動線からずらすために南へ1移動して被攻撃リスクを下げる。次ターンBSQ2も着艦→即再出撃で同一点へ集中打撃、撃沈を狙う。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":12,"y":18},"launch_target":{"x":10,"y":10}}}

{"thinking":"敵空母AC1は(10,10)で固定傾向、残HP50。決着を急ぐ。BSQ1はすでに(10,10)へ向け往路。BSQ2も同一点へ同時到達を狙って発艦、集中打撃で撃沈を目指す。空母は現在位置で発艦半径・対空圏を維持しつつ不用意に前進しない。敵ASQ2の所在は北東で脅威度は中、位置ずらしは不要と判断。","action":{"carrier_target":null,"launch_target":{"x":10,"y":10}}}
